backend/main.mo: Actor providing user profile storage, ML prediction generation, and permission‑checked access using authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a dashboard UI change to the affected frontend file and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme variables and applying global background and text colors.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the main React entry point with a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring providers and TanStack Router routes for all screens.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialStore.ts: LocalStorage‑based demo account store supporting account creation, uniqueness checks, and password verification.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialTypes.ts: Type definitions for demo accounts and results returned by authentication helpers.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Local session manager handling creation, validation, persistence, and clearing of OTP, password, and guest sessions.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Deterministic command interpreter handling navigation, medical queries, emergency detection, and unsupported Flutter requests.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Chat UI panel handling text/voice input, status messages, TTS playback, and auto‑scrolling transcript display.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: LocalStorage persistence for transcript data with versioning and safe load/save/clear operations.
Type definitions for messages, assistant status, overall state, and command results.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Floating assistant widget managing panel visibility, routing commands, transcript updates, and message processing.
frontend/src/components/assistant/medica: Static medical knowledge base with symptoms, clarifying questions, responses, disclaimers, and emergency guidance.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useAss: React hook managing transcript state with persistent storage and helper methods to add and clear messages.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useSpe: Custom hook wrapping browser speech recognition with interim/final transcripts, error handling, and start/stop/reset actions.
Custom hook for browser TTS with speak/cancel controls, enable toggle, and speaking state tracking.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useTra: React hook that manages auto-scrolling behavior for a transcript list with configurable threshold and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/designB/components/Dashboar: Header component that displays a title, optional caption, and optional action button.
Configurable dashboard tile with icon, label, optional value/caption, color accents, and interactive or static variants.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBS: Wrapper component that renders a styled surface with default, elevated, or outlined variants.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBT: Collection of styled typography components including page titles, section titles, captions, and body text.
frontend/src/designB/components/ThemeSwi: UI switch allowing users to toggle between default and Design B themes.
frontend/src/designB/data/placeholders.t: Defines a UserProfile type and exports a deterministic mock user generated with a fixed seed.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBAppSh: Main app shell providing header, content area, bottom navigation, assistant widget, and footer with conditional visibility.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBBotto: Bottom tab navigation component for switching between Home, Reports, and Profile routes.
frontend/src/designB/storage/themePrefer: Functions for saving and loading the user's theme preference to localStorage.
frontend/src/designB/theme.ts: Defines the Design B theme configuration and functions to apply or remove it from the document.
frontend/src/designB/themeContext.tsx: Context provider and hook for managing and persisting the current design theme.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthSession.ts: Hook for managing local demo authentication sessions including OTP, password, and guest modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDemoOtp.ts: Implements a demo OTP system with code generation, verification, expiry, resend cooldown, and session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and tracking login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMedicalFiles.ts: Implements React Query hooks for listing, uploading, deleting, and downloading medical files by combining backend actor calls with local metadata storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains example query hooks and a hook to fetch the current user's backend profile, tied to actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useRedirectIfAuthenti: Redirects users to /home when they already have an Internet Identity or local session.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequireAuth.ts: Route guard hook that redirects unauthenticated users to /signin based on Internet Identity and local session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Resolves a user's display name using profile data, session info, or principal fallback with a defined priority order.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, and light/dark theme variables including overrides for a secondary design theme.
frontend/src/lib/flaker.ts: Provides a seeded random data generator for producing deterministic fake user profiles and related fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentDetails.ts: Empty file or placeholder for appointment details page.
frontend/src/pages/Chatbot.tsx: Implements an authenticated medical chatbot page with message handling, command interpretation, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorList.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomeDashboard.tsx: Displays the authenticated health dashboard with daily metrics and quick‑action navigation tiles.
frontend/src/pages/Locate.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundRedirect.tsx: Redirects any unknown or removed routes to the /home page on load.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Shows and edits user profile details, including validation, save handling, and sign‑out logic.
frontend/src/pages/Report.tsx: Manages upload, download, and deletion of medical report files with authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Provides multiple sign‑in flows including OTP, password, and Internet Identity, with redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Implements a signup form that validates user input, creates a local account, initializes a local profile, and redirects to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Displays the welcome screen with hero content and allows users to sign in or continue as guests.
frontend/src/profile/profileBackendMappe: Provides functions to convert profile data between backend UserProfile format and frontend ProfileDetails format, including enum and date conversions.
frontend/src/profile/profileLocalStore.t: Manages storing, loading, and initializing profile data in localStorage based on the current session type.
frontend/src/profile/profileTypes.ts: Defines the ProfileDetails type and utilities for creating empty profiles and checking if profile data exists.
frontend/src/profile/profileValidation.t: Validates ProfileDetails fields and returns user-friendly error messages for invalid or incomplete data.
frontend/src/profile/useProfileDetails.t: React hook that loads and saves profile details from either backend (Internet Identity) or localStorage sessions.
Handles loading, saving, deleting, and clearing medical file metadata persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash. Includes helpers to get, store, retrieve, and clear parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors, fonts, spacing, shadows, and animations. Extends theme settings for layout, components, and styling tokens.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature state, and pending requests. Currently records a change to replace the 'Book Appointment' quick action with 'Log Avoid'.
